definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)
polyester khaki (abbr. for 滌綸卡其布|涤纶卡其布)
to wash away/to eliminate/to do away with

sentences.english: Beauty, find a chance to wash out heart lungs polyester traveling.
sentences.chinese: 偶然覓得真善美，洗心滌肺出凡塵。

sentences.english: Using three chemicals to paint blotch infected fungi, then observed control effect.
sentences.chinese: 試驗用三種化學藥劑滌抹樺木被害部位觀察防腐效果。

sentences.english: How wanton thy waters her snowy feet lave.
sentences.chinese: 你的流水如此頑皮，濯滌着她潔白的雙足。

sentences.english: The boss struck off 100 dollars the salary of the employee as fine.
sentences.chinese: 老闆滌這個僱員的氦資里扣除100睦元傖爲筏款。

sentences.english: The paper introduced the flame retardant processing and its technology key of polyester and viscose midfibre blend wool-like fabric.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了滌粘中長仿毛織物的阻燃工藝和技術關鍵。

sentences.english: From our perch up there on top of cliff we can see the whole town.
sentences.chinese: 我們滌懸衙頂上的膏處能看督城市的痊景。

sentences.english: Only when the dust being cleared out, the buds of evil being cut can one see the original.
sentences.chinese: 須是滌盡渣滓，斬絕萌芽，才見本來真體。

definition: Canglang district of Suzhou city 蘇州市|苏州市[Su1 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu
to accumulate/to hold in store/to contain/to gather together/to collect/depth/inner strength/profundity
to inscribe a poem (often, composed on the spot) on a painting, fan or ceramic bowl etc as a work of calligraphy/an inscribed poem
poetry and pictorial art/work of art combining pictures and poetry
to wash/to squander/to sweep away/to move/to shake/dissolute/pond
